pageContext.claim: “I've been in two elections. I won them both and the second one, I won much bigger than the first.”
pageContext.analysis: A signature line of Trump’s rallies is that he only once ran for political office — for president — and he won. (That’s not true, as he briefly sought the Reform Party nomination in 2000.) Here, he’s trying to adjust his line by falsely claiming he won the second election — even though he lost.
